title: Chicken Parmesan Salad
directions: Cut potatoes in small cubes and toss on a baking sheet.
Drizzle with oil and a pinch of salt and pepper.
Meanwhile, combine panko, Parmesan, garlic powder, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Pound chicken breasts with mallet and season with salt and pepper.
Place chicken in a lightly oiled baking sheet and brush tops with 2 tbsp sour cream.
Press the crust mixture on chicken and bake chicken in oven for 12-15 minutes (same temperature as potatoes).
Combine 1 tbsp sour cream, a large drizzle of olive oil, a squeeze of lemon, a pinch of salt and pepper in a large bowl.
Add spinach and potatoes to bowl to toss.. Season again with salt and pepper.
Divide the spinach and potatoes between plates and top with chicken. You can squeeze more lemon on top if desired.
Notes: It may need more seasoning than what is called for.
